sentence.Network_en: For this peccadillo he was demoted and sent back to pound the beat.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于这次过失,他被降了级,又被打发去干徒步巡警了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 法律翻译常用拉丁词汇 | 法律英语翻译 ... Pactum illicitum 非法协定 peccadillo 轻罪 peccatum 罪行.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... simpatio 可爱的，和谐的 peccadillo 小过失 dynamo 发电机.

list.abs: 有“小”特点的词常考小与一般小过失小错误peccadillo lapse foiblecavity 小洞 cavern 大洞

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Spanish pecadillo, diminutive of pecado 'sin', from Latin peccare 'to sin'

entry.def: Peccadilloes are small, unimportant sins or faults.

example.ex: People are prepared to be tolerant of extra-marital peccadilloes by public figures.
example.tran: 人们可以容忍公众人物婚外的不检点行为。

auth_sentence.content: What the boy does...as a manly peccadillo, the girl will shudder at...as vice.
auth_sentence.res_content: What the boy does...as a manly peccadillo, the girl will shudder at...as vice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What the boy does...as a manly peccadillo, the girl will shudder at...as vice.

sentences.en: For this peccadillo he was demoted and sent back to pound the beat.
sentences.cn: 由于这次过失，他被降了级，又被打发去干徒步巡警了。

sentences.en: His peccadilloes finally broke his marriage.
sentences.cn: 他的小过失最终毁灭了他的婚姻。
